findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: Smart contract owner can mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment without an upper limit and/or community consensus, corresponding to elevated centralization risk.

findings.title: Centralization Risk
findings.description: Active contract ownership identified, which can lead to centralization of power and increase the risk of rug pull scams.

findings.title: Elevated centralization risk
findings.description: The smart contract has an active ownership which creates a high risk of rug pull scams and centralization hacks.
